WELCOME_PAGE.title_2: is designed to help high-performing teams achieve their goals. With an intuitive interface, it's easy to get organized and to get started
WELCOME_PAGE.subtitle1: PM app provides a visual way to manage your projects,
WELCOME_PAGE.subtitle2: making it easy to track progress and identify any roadblocks,
WELCOME_PAGE.subtitle3: with features such as task lists,
WELCOME_PAGE.subtitle7: you can customize your workflow to match your team's needs.

tools-section.list_description1: Organize and assign tasks. With lists, teams see immediately what they need to do, which tasks are a priority, and when work is due.
tools-section.list_description2: Make it easy for your team to focus on tasks currently at hand. Define each stage of work to see what/’s important and where things are getting stuck.
tools-section.list_description3: PMA cards are your portal to more organized work—where every single part of your task can be managed, tracked, and shared with teammates.

about-section.title: ABOUT ME
about-section.description: The application is developed as part of an JS/FE 2022Q3 course by Rolling Scopes School.
